articles.author: Francois Murphy
articles.title: Austria imposes full lockdown and set to become first country in western Europe to make vaccines compulsory - Independent.ie
articles.description: Austria will become the first country in western Europe to reimpose a full coronavirus lockdown this autumn to tackle a new wave of infections, and will require its whole population to be vaccinated as of February, its government said on Friday.
